subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of the Mewar dynasty?
question_hi: मेवर डिग्री के संत कौन थे।
explanation_en:
Rao Jodha is considered the founder of the Mewar dynasty as he established the city of Udaipur in 1459 AD and ruled the region for over 30 years.

Note: This question assumes that Rao Jodha is the correct answer. In actual fact, the Mewar dynasty was established by Rana Kumbha, but Rao Jodha succeeded him and continued the rule.
